# The `BitstreamRemarkParser` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Parses and holds the state of the latest parsed remark. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Parses and holds the state of the latest parsed remark.

## Public Member Functions

### next() {#a74eaa072e891d07610135a6406c752b3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Expected&lt; std::unique&#95;ptr&lt; Remark &gt; &gt; BitstreamRemarkParser::next ()</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
If no error occurs, this returns a valid <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/remarks/remark">Remark</a> object.

If an error of type <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/remarks/endoffileerror">EndOfFileError</a> occurs, it is safe to recover from it by stopping the parsing. If any other error occurs, it should be propagated to the user. The pointer should never be null.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/remarks/bitstreamremarkparser-h/#l00056">56</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/remarks/bitstreamremarkparser-h">BitstreamRemarkParser.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/remarks/bitstreamremarkparser-cpp/#l00332">332</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/remarks/bitstreamremarkparser-cpp">BitstreamRemarkParser.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
